title: Champion Trial System
body:
I was recently trying out Blizzard's game Heroes of the Storm when i stumbled across a try button. This allowed you to try the champion against bots before you actually buy them. I think this feature should be in League as the champions take quite a while to earn and buying a champion which doesn't suit you, is a big set back.
Features it should include:

* Instant level 18 (unless set otherwise)
* Cooldown reset button (possibly health and mana too)
* Freeze minions/bots button
* Toggle/Reset minions, monsters and bots

If this is not implemented then I think the top two tiers (6300ip and 4800ip) of champions should be reduced in price.
